name: Skittering Sneak
summary: You squish, slink, and skitter from cover to cover with great speed and stealth.
description:
You squish, slink, and skitter from cover to cover with great speed and stealth. You can move up to your full Speed when you Sneak.Traits

Ratfolk: A creature with this trait is a member of the ratfolk ancestry. Ratfolk are humanoids who resemble rats. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by ratfolk.
